databases.name: National Stock Exchange of India
databases.description: Stock and index data from the National Stock Exchange of India.

databases.name: Bank of England Official Statistics
databases.description: Current and historical exchange rates, interest rates on secured loans and time deposits, Euro-commercial paper rates, and yields on government securities.

databases.name: US Trade Representative
databases.description: Shows historical growth and of US Trade since 1970.

databases.name: Bank of Mexico
databases.description: The Bank of Mexico is responsible for monetary policy and the national currency (peso), and provides data on accounts and all macroeconomic variables.

databases.name: National Transportation Safety Board
databases.description: Investigates accidents in aviation, highway, marine, rail and pipeline and makes recommendations to improve safety. Data on accidents and injuries.

databases.name: Johnston's Archive
databases.description: An online archive for a wide range of fields, curated by  Robert Johnson, a research physicists. He provides historical abortion statistics for many countries.

databases.name: Federal Reserve Economic Data
databases.description: Growth, employment, inflation, labor, manufacturing and other US economic statistics from the research department of the Federal Reserve Bank of St. Louis.

databases.name: National Gang Center
databases.description: Department of Justice project that targets gangs and its members in the United States. It publishes data on the numbers of gangs and gang members of all ages.

databases.name: U.S. Census Bureau
databases.description: Data on the American people, places and economy. It provides many data on U.S. imports/exports, domestic production, and other key national indicators.

databases.name: U.S. Department of Agriculture ERS
databases.description: The primary statistical agency of the USDA provides data on the consumption and production of food and products related to the agriculture industry.

databases.name: Canadian Mortgage and Housing Corporation
databases.description: The CMHC is a gov’t-owned corporation that provides affordable housing to Canadian citizens and collects data such as prices, construction, and supply.

databases.name: Center for Systemic Peace
databases.description: Monitors political behaviour and violence in the world's major states. Provides data on relevant indicators including levels of forcible displacement.

databases.name: Global Stats StatCounter
databases.description: A web analytics firm that publishes data on internet browser usage, web activity, and other related statistics.

databases.name: FBI
databases.description: The FBI is a federal criminal investigative body and internal intelligence agency, publishing data on crime rates in the U.S.

databases.name: Uniform Crime Reporting Statistics
databases.description: The Uniform Crime Reports in the FBI compile differing crime data into uniform statistics on specific crimes for states and the entire country.

databases.name: Economic Cycle Research Institute
databases.description: ECRI uses an indicator approach to predict recessions and recoveries, publishing data on indexes of coincident, lagging, and leading indicators for the US.

databases.name: Quito Stock Exchange (Ecuador)
databases.description: The indexes of the national Stock Exchange of Ecuador.

databases.name: Prague Stock Exchange
databases.description: Price index data from the Prague Stock Exchange.

databases.name: PFTS Stock Exchange (Ukraine)
databases.description: Index data from the PFTS Stock Exchange, the largest marketplace in Ukraine.

databases.name: Ljubljana Stock Exchange (Slovenia)
databases.description: This database contains the Ljubljana Stock Exchange indexes and is based in Ljubljana, Slovenia.

databases.name: Luxembourg Stock Exchange
databases.description: A stock exchange located in Luxembourg specializing in international bonds. It publishes data on the performance of its stocks and its main equity index Luxx.

databases.name: Bucharest Stock Exchange
databases.description: The Bucharest Stock Exchange publishes data on it activity in equity, rights, bonds, fund units, structured products, and futures contracts.

databases.name: Stock Exchange of Thailand
databases.description: The official securities exchange of Thailand. It publishes data on the indexes that are traded on it as well as on the performance of the exchange itself

databases.name: Eurekahedge
databases.description: A research company focused on hedge funds and other alternative investment funds. It publishes data on the performances of hedge funds.

databases.name: Penn World Table
databases.description: Provides purchasing power parity, national income accounts converted to international prices, income, population, productivity for 167 countries.

databases.name: Lima Stock Exchange (Peru)
databases.description: Lima Stock Exchange indices data.

databases.name: James Alan Fox
databases.description: Historical crime statistics in the United States.

databases.name: Angus Maddison
databases.description: The Angus Maddison project provides population and GDP data for countries around the world.

databases.name: Asia Bond Market Initiative
databases.description: An initiative designed to promote bond market development in Asia. It publishes data related to the corporate and government bond markets of individual Asian countries

databases.name: NYU Stern
databases.description: No description for this database yet.

databases.name: Freddie Mac
databases.description: Data from Freddie Mac’s Primary Mortgage Market Survey and other region specific historical mortgage rates.

databases.name: ADP Research Institute
databases.description: The research arm of ADP publishes statistics on employment in the United States

databases.name: National Association of Homebuilders
databases.description: A trade association in housing, home-ownership, and residential buildings. Data on opportunity indexes and related economic indicators for the US.

databases.name: Swiss National Bank
databases.description: Central bank responsible for monetary policy and currency. Data on international accounts, interest rates, money supply, and other macroeconomic indicators.

databases.name: U.S. Patent and Trademark Office
databases.description: Federal agency for granting U.S. patents and registering trademarks, leading the nation and the world in intellectual property protection and policy.

databases.name: United Nations Office on Drugs and Crime
databases.description: UN office in charge of formulating a comprehensive and coordinated response to the interrelated issues of the illicit drug trade and international crime.

databases.name: American Association of Individual Investors
databases.description: American Association of Individual Investor’s sentiment data.

databases.name: U.S. Department of Agriculture NASS
databases.description: The National Agricultural Statistics Service data on nearly every aspect of the U.S. agricultural industry; production, prices, labor and wages, finances, etc.

databases.name: Australian Bureau of Statistics
databases.description: Australia's national statistical agency provides socioeconomic and financial data on the country to the public and different levels of government.

databases.name: National Venture Capital Association Data
databases.description: Comprehensive annual data on the venture capital industry in the U.S. covering investments, deal-making, startup valuations, as well as IPOs and Acquisitions.

databases.name: International Organization of Motor Vehicle Manufacturers
databases.description: An international federation of automotive manufacturers. This organization provides data on motor vehicle production and sales on a country-by-country basis.

databases.name: Central Bank of Egypt
databases.description: The Central Bank of Egypt provides data on key macroeconomic indicators such as interest rates and the money supply.

databases.name: Singularity
databases.description: Ray Kurzweil's Singularity group publishes data related to technological innovation and advancement; Prices, computing power, Internet use.

databases.name: NYSE Factbook
databases.description: Historical and current securities market credit data from the NYSE.

databases.name: Labour Bureau Government of India
databases.description: The Indian Bureau of Labour's consumer price index for industrial workers.

databases.name: National Institute of Statistics and Economic Studies (France)
databases.description: INSEE is the national statistical agency of France. It collects data on France's economy and society, such as socioeconomic indicators and national accounts.

databases.name: Montreal Exchange
databases.description: Montreal Exchange is a derivatives exchange that trades in futures contracts and options for equities, indices, currencies, ETFs, energy, and interest rates.

databases.name: Osaka Securities Exchange
databases.description: The second largest securities exchange in Japan. Unlike the TSE, OSE is strongest in derivatives trading, the majority of futures and options in Japan.

databases.name: UK Office for Budget Responsibility
databases.description: UK Fiscal forecast data by the Office for Budget Responsibility.

databases.name: Commodity Futures Trading Commission Reports
databases.description: Weekly Commitment of Traders and Concentration Ratios. Reports for futures positions, as well as futures plus options positions. New and legacy formats.

databases.name: Bursa Malaysia
databases.description: The major stock exchange of Malaysia. It publishes various financial data related to indexes, futures, derivatives, and other securities.

databases.name: PRICE-DATA.COM
databases.description: Historical futures prices from the Tokyo Stock Price Index.

databases.name: Federal Deposit Insurance Corporation
databases.description: The FDIC is a federal insurer of bank deposits up to $250k and collects finance data on commercial banking and savings institutions.

databases.name: Archival Federal Reserve Economic Data
databases.description: ALFRED® provides vintage versions of historical economic data.

databases.name: Tokyo Financial Exchange
databases.description: The Tokyo Financial Exchange is a futures exchange that primary deals in financial instruments markets that handle securities and market derivatives.

databases.name: Hong Kong Exchange
databases.description: Hong Kong Exchange stock prices, historical divided futures, etc. updated daily.

databases.name: Perth Mint
databases.description: The Perth Mint’s highs, lows and averages of interest rates and commodities prices, updated on a monthly basis.

databases.name: BLS Employment & Unemployment
databases.description: US national and state-level employment and unemployment statistics, published by the Bureau of Labor Statistics.

databases.name: BLS Pay & Benefits
databases.description: US work stoppage statistics, published by the Bureau of Labor Statistics.

databases.name: OptionWorks Futures Options
databases.description: EOD implied volatilities for options on major futures contracts, including at-the-money, risk reversals, butterflies, and skew models.

databases.name: United Nations Commodity Trade
databases.description: This database offers comprehensive global data on imports and exports of commodities such as food, live animals, pharmaceuticals, metals, fuels and machinery.

databases.name: United Nations Environment Statistics
databases.description: This database offers global data on water and waste related indicators, including fresh water supply and precipitation, and generation and collection of waste.

databases.name: United Nations Food and Agriculture
databases.description: This database offers global food and agricultural data, covering crop production, fertilizer consumption, use of land for agriculture, and livestock.

databases.name: United Nations Labour Market Indicators
databases.description: This database offers comprehensive youth unemployment figures broken up by gender for all countries in the world.

databases.name: World Bank Africa Development Indicators
databases.description: A collection of development indicators on Africa, including national, regional and global estimates.

databases.name: World Bank Exporter Dynamics Database
databases.description: Exporter data on distribution, diversification in products and markets, entry dynamics, exit, survival, and prices.

databases.name: World Bank Global Economic Monitor
databases.description: Data on global economic developments, with coverage of high-income, as well as developing countries.

databases.name: European Commission Monetary Conditions Index
databases.description: Updated monthly, this database provides monetary conditions index values in the Euro zone. History goes back to 1999.

databases.name: Paris School of Economics
databases.description: This database describes the distribution of top incomes in a growing number of countries. Numbers are derived using tax data.

databases.name: Coinbase Bitcoin Pricing
databases.description: Coinbase is the world’s most popular place to buy and sell bitcoin.

databases.name: China Financial Futures Exchange
databases.description: Index and bond futures from CFFEX, with history spanning almost a decade for select futures.

databases.name: Zhengzhou Commodities Exchange
databases.description: Agriculture and commodities futures from ZCE, with history spanning almost a decade for select futures.

databases.name: US Department of Homeland Security
databases.description: The federal agency that is charged with protecting domestic security. It publishes data on refugee arrivals.

databases.name: Natural Resources Canada
databases.description: No description for this database yet.

databases.name: Geo3 Data Compendium
databases.description: The authoritative compendium of data for the UN Environmental Program. It offers data on hundreds of environmental variables for different countries and regions

databases.name: National Bureau of Economic Research
databases.description: A private research organization providing economic research to inform businesses, policy-makers, and academia. Economic indicators in the U.S. and the world.

databases.name: Bank of Canada Statistical Database
databases.description: Economic, financial and banking data for Canada. Includes interest rates, inflation, national accounts and more.  Daily updates.

databases.name: National UFO Reporting Center
databases.description: A national database of UFO sightings.

databases.name: London Stock Exchange
databases.description: Daily updated stock prices for the London Stock Exchange.

databases.name: US Geological Survey
databases.description: The USGS National Earthquake Information Center's statistics on earthquakes.

databases.name: Chicago Board Options Exchange
databases.description: The Chicago Board Options Exchange is the largest options exchange in the US, offering many different options contracts for companies, indices, and ETFs.

databases.name: Budapest Stock Exchange
databases.description: A primary exchange in Hungarian financial markets and the official trading venue for public securities.

databases.name: Amman Stock Exchange
databases.description: The official stock exchange of Jordan. It publishes daily financial data on indexes that represent different sectors of the economy.

databases.name: Stock Exchange of Mauritius
databases.description: Stock Exchange of Mauritius indices data.

databases.name: EUREX Futures Data
databases.description: Index, rate, agriculture and energy futures from EUREX, Europe's largest futures exchange, with history spanning a decade for select futures.

databases.name: LIFFE Futures Data
databases.description: Futures data from LIFFE for a variety of equities, softs and grains.  Contains years of history for many futures.

databases.name: Singapore Exchange
databases.description: Asian securities and derivatives exchange that trades in equities for many large Singaporean and other Asian companies. Listed on its own exchange.

databases.name: Center for Applied Studies on Applied Economics (Brazil)
databases.description: CEPEA is an economic research center at the University of Sao Paulo focusing on agribusiness issues, publishing price indices for commodities in Brazil.

databases.name: University of Michigan
databases.description: The University of Michigan’s consumer survey - data points for the most recent 6 months are unofficial; they are sourced from articles in the Wall Street Journal.

databases.name: Multi Commodity Exchange India
databases.description: India's largest commodity exchange servicing futures trading in metals, energy, and agriculture. World's 3rd largest exchange in contracts and trading volume.

databases.name: Asian Development Bank
databases.description: Key development indicators (GDP, GNI, etc.) for countries in Asia and the Pacific.

databases.name: Financial Industry Regulatory Authority
databases.description: Financial Industry Regulatory Authority provides short interest data on securities firms and exchange markets.

databases.name: CryptoCoinChart
databases.description: Historical price data of crypto currencies.

databases.name: Bitcoin Average
databases.description: BitcoinAverage's Bitcoin Price Index is an average rate of all integrated exchanges, weighted by trading volume.

databases.name: Bitstamp
databases.description: Bitstamp is a trading platform for Bitcoin.

databases.name: Bitfinex
databases.description: Bitfinex is a trading platform for Bitcoin, Litecoin and Darkcoin with many advanced features including margin trading, exchange and peer to peer margin funding.

databases.name: BTC-e
databases.description: Exchange rates on the BTC-e exchange.

databases.name: Thomas Piketty
databases.description: Data on Income and Wealth from "Capital in the 21st Century", Harvard University Press 2014.
